member.name: RenderingParameters
member.summary: Contains the current values of rendering parameters on the DMR.

member.name: RenderingParameters.mute
member.summary: This value is True if audio is currently muted on the DMR, and is False otherwise.

member.name: RenderingParameters.volume
member.summary: The current audio volume level of the device, in the range 0 to 100, or -1 if the device does not support controlling the volume level. A value of 0 is the lowest volume and a value of 100 is the highest.
